long_description: Providing instant wicking action and a lightweight, comfortable feel, the Patagonia Gamut short-sleeve shirt upgrades the basic T-shirt to a performance piece that helps you go the distance. Soft, stretchy polyester/spandex fabric blend wicks moisture away and dries quickly, perfect for running, hiking or other aerobic activity. Mesh paneling on back and sleeves increases breathability and moisture transfer. Integrated UPF 25 sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. Gladiodor(R) helps control odor even after multiple wears, perfect for camping, traveling or backpacking. Patagonia Gamut short-sleeve shirt is tagless and virtually seam-free for smooth, non-chafing comfort. Slim fit. Closeout.
short_description: Providing instant wicking action and a lightweight, comfortable feel, the Patagonia Gamut short-sleeve shirt upgrades the basic T-shirt to a performance piece that helps you go the distance.
